statements: SELECT * FROM LeadStatus;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM LeadStatus WHERE update_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_id, lead_status FROM LeadStatus ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status IN ('Qualified', 'Contacted') ORDER BY lead_id ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status, update_timestamp FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM LeadStatus WHERE update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_name FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM LeadStatus WHERE update_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT lead_status FROM LeadStatus ORDER BY lead_status;
SELECT * FROM LeadStatus;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM LeadStatus ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT * FROM LeadHistory ORDER BY status_change_time ASC;
SELECT lead_id, previous_status, new_status FROM LeadHistory WHERE status_change_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM LeadHistory ORDER BY status_change_time DESC;
SELECT lead_id, previous_status FROM LeadHistory WHERE new_status = 'Converted';
SELECT lead_id, COUNT(*) AS status_changes FROM LeadHistory GROUP BY lead_id HAVING status_changes > 2;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM leads WHERE lead_status='new';
SELECT * FROM lead_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, tracking_date, tracking_location FROM lead_tracking WHERE tracking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_status='Active';
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM leads WHERE lead_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT lead_name, lead_status, update_description FROM leads l INNER JOIN lead_updates u ON l.lead_id = u.lead_id ORDER BY u.update_timestamp DESC;

SELECT lead_name, tracking_location, tracking_description FROM leads l INNER JOIN lead_tracking t ON l.lead_id = t.lead_id WHERE tracking_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tracking_date ASC, tracking_location DESC;
SELECT lead_name AS Name, lead_status AS Status, lead_source AS Source FROM leads WHERE lead_status='Closed' ORDER BY Name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lead_statuses ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM lead_statuses GROUP BY status
SELECT lead_id, status FROM lead_statuses WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity JOIN users ON user_activity.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT * FROM lead_statuses WHERE status = 'New' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT users.username, user_activity.activity_type FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE users.role = 'Admin' AND user_activity.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY users.username ASC, user_activity.timestamp DESC

SELECT lead_statuses.status, lead_history.timestamp, users.username FROM lead_statuses JOIN lead_history ON lead_statuses.lead_id = lead_history.lead_id JOIN users ON lead_history.lead_id = users.user_id WHERE users.role = 'Sales' ORDER BY lead_history.timestamp ASC, users.username DESC
SELECT DISTINCT users.username, users.email FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_activity.activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY users.username ASC

SELECT users.username, users.email, user_activity.activity_type FROM users LEFT JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id AND user_activity.timestamp > '2022-01-01' WHERE user_activity.activity_type IS NULL ORDER BY users.username DESC, users.email ASC
SELECT * FROM lead_tracking;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_history WHERE old_status='New';
SELECT DISTINCT username, role FROM lead_users ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT lead_id, note, creation_time FROM lead_notes WHERE created_by='John Doe' ORDER BY creation_time DESC;
SELECT lead_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM lead_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC, metric_name;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_tracking WHERE lead_status='Converted' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status, last_updated FROM lead_tracking WHERE lead_status='Open' AND last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM lead_history WHERE updated_by='John Doe' AND update_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM lead_users WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT lead_id, metric_name, metric_value, measurement_time FROM lead_metrics WHERE metric_name='Conversion Rate' ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
